| **[Reference](/wiki/Source_code "Source code")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    | [SLASH'EM\_0.0.7E7F2/monst.c#line2960](/wiki/SLASH%27EM_0.0.7E7F2/monst.c#line2960 "SLASH'EM 0.0.7E7F2/monst.c") |

A **moldy pudding**, P, is a type of [monster](/wiki/Monster "Monster") that appears in [SLASH'EM](/wiki/SLASH%27EM "SLASH'EM"), [SlashTHEM](/wiki/SlashTHEM "SlashTHEM") and [Hack'EM](/wiki/Hack%27EM "Hack'EM"). It is a [pudding](/wiki/Pudding_or_ooze "Pudding or ooze") that is similar to the weaker [brown pudding](/wiki/Brown_pudding "Brown pudding"), and has an [acidic](/wiki/Acidic "Acidic") body.

A moldy pudding has an [engulfing](/wiki/Engulfing "Engulfing") attack that can [rot](/wiki/Rot "Rot") organic items in your inventory, and [hits as a +1 weapon](/wiki/Hits_creatures_as_%2Bx_weapon "Hits creatures as +x weapon"). Moldy puddings possess [cold resistance](/wiki/Cold_resistance "Cold resistance"), [poison resistance](/wiki/Poison_resistance "Poison resistance"), [sleep resistance](/wiki/Sleep_resistance "Sleep resistance"), [shock resistance](/wiki/Shock_resistance "Shock resistance"), [acid resistance](/wiki/Acid_resistance "Acid resistance"), [stoning resistance](/wiki/Stoning_resistance "Stoning resistance"), and [death resistance](/wiki/Death_resistance "Death resistance").

## Generation

Randomly generated moldy puddings are always generated hostile. Moldy puddings will not randomly generate in [Gehennom](/wiki/Gehennom "Gehennom").

In Hack'EM, moldy puddings leave [globs](/wiki/Glob "Glob") instead of [corpses](/wiki/Corpse "Corpse").

## Encyclopedia entry

- *See the [encyclopedia entry for amoeboid](/wiki/Amoeboid#Encyclopedia_entry "Amoeboid").*

* *This page is a **[stub](/wiki/Category:Stubs "Category:Stubs")**. Should you wish to do so, you can contribute by [**expanding this page**.](https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Moldy_pudding\&action=edit)*

html:
Moldy pudding

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search
P moldy pudding
Difficulty 9
Attacks Engulfing 4d4 decays organic items
P moldy pudding
Difficulty 9
Attacks

Engulfing 4d4 decays organic items

Base level 8
Base experience 116
Speed 3
Base AC 8
Base MR 0
Alignment 0 (neutral)
Frequency (by normal means) 0 (Not randomly generated)
Genocidable Yes
Weight 500
Nutritional value 250
Size Medium
Resistances death magic, cold, electricity, poison, acid, petrification
Resistances conveyed poison (18%), cold (18%), electricity (18%), Cures stoning

A moldy pudding:

  • can flow under doors.
  • does not breathe.
  • has no eyes.
  • has no limbs.
  • has no head.
  • is mindless.
  • is acidic to eat.
  • is omnivorous.
  • is neither male nor female.
  • is normally generated hostile.
  • does not appear in Gehennom.
  • hits creatures as a +1 weapon.
Reference SLASH'EM_0.0.7E7F2/monst.c#line2960

A moldy pudding, P, is a type of monster that appears in SLASH'EM, SlashTHEM and Hack'EM. It is a pudding that is similar to the weaker brown pudding, and has an acidic body.

A moldy pudding has an engulfing attack that can rot organic items in your inventory, and hits as a +1 weapon. Moldy puddings possess cold resistance, poison resistance, sleep resistance, shock resistance, acid resistance, stoning resistance, and death resistance.

Generation

Randomly generated moldy puddings are always generated hostile. Moldy puddings will not randomly generate in Gehennom.

In Hack'EM, moldy puddings leave globs instead of corpses.

Encyclopedia entry

See the encyclopedia entry for amoeboid.
This page is a stub. Should you wish to do so, you can contribute by expanding this page.

A '''moldy pudding''', {{monsym|moldy pudding}}, is a type of [[monster]] that appears in [[SLASH'EM]], [[SlashTHEM]] and [[Hack'EM]]. It is a [[Pudding or ooze|pudding]] that is similar to the weaker [[brown pudding]], and has an [[acidic]] body.

A moldy pudding has an [[engulfing]] attack that can [[rot]] organic items in your inventory, and [[Hits creatures as +x weapon|hits as a +1 weapon]]. Moldy puddings possess [[cold resistance]], [[poison resistance]], [[sleep resistance]], [[shock resistance]], [[acid resistance]], [[stoning resistance]], and [[death resistance]].

==Generation==
Randomly generated moldy puddings are always generated hostile. Moldy puddings will not randomly generate in [[Gehennom]].

In Hack'EM, moldy puddings leave [[glob]]s instead of [[corpse]]s.
